LanguageData.VeryEasy.label: Base builder
LanguageData.VeryEasy.description: For those who want to relax and build a colony in a sandbox-like environment. Threats appear, but they're extremely weak. Some of the more dangerous events are disabled.
LanguageData.Easy.label: Casual
LanguageData.Easy.description: For casual players who still want challenges here and there. Threats are scaled back quite a bit, but no so much that they can be ignored.
LanguageData.Medium.label: 荒涼とした大地
LanguageData.Medium.description: 荒々しい惑星です。 Threats can be quite dangerous. You'll need to apply some skill to survive.
LanguageData.Hard.label: 挑戦
LanguageData.Hard.description: A significant challenge. Succeeding at this level requires a solid and well-rounded understanding of survival strategies.
LanguageData.VeryHard.label: 過激
LanguageData.VeryHard.description: ダイヤモンドの刃先ぐらいの硬派なモードです。 敵は強く、価値は低く、食料は足りず、植民者は気難しい。ヤマイな人々に贈ります。
